actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making appropriations for section 103 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Makes appropriations for grants to States and units of general local government to help finance community development programs under the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill making appropriations for section 103 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976.
